author: Staff Reporter
text: HOPES, a city-based NGO is organising a one-day workshop, ‘Early financial planning for the newly and recently wedded couples’ as part of fundraising for the organisation’s projects, on February 13. According to a press release, the workshop aims at professionally equipping newlyweds with financial goal-setting, early wealth creation and knowledge on tools to buy assets, travel etc. The fee will be Rs. 2,000 per couple. Lunch, tea and materials will be provided. For details, call: 9840173311.
title: One-day workshop on Feb. 13
